flavorText: The loyalty of a felidar is hard won but worth the effort.
name: Felidar Guardian

rulings.text: If a creature token is exiled this way, it will cease to exist and will not return to the battlefield.

After the permanent returns to the battlefield, it will be a new object with no connection to the permanent that was exiled. It won’t have any additional abilities it may have had when it was exiled. Any +1/+1 counters on it or Auras attached to it are removed, and any Equipment will no longer be attached.

text: When Felidar Guardian enters the battlefield, you may exile another target permanent you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
